questions.question: This man, who may be a hero or a traitor, allegedly stole a trove of information from Booz Allen, and has been releasing it ever since.
This was the codename of an NSA project to tap into datastores of major companies.
This US agency's founder, J. Edgar Hoover,  was rumoured to have a fondness for cross-dressing.
This surveillance network was first publically reported in Duncan Campbell's 1988 article, "Somebody's Listening"
This CIA project, lasting from 1950 - 1970, experimented with mind control using a combination of kidnapping, torture, hypnosis and LSD, and is a fertile source of conspiracy theories.
